SEARCH
Package Appointment

Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
Appointment.AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
The AppointmentManager class provides functionality for managing patient appointments, including scheduling, loading, updating, and deleting appointments.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentManager

      public AppointmentManager()

  • Method Details

    • saveAppointmentsToFile

      public static void saveAppointmentsToFile(List<Appointment> appointments, String filePath)
      Saves the list of appointments to a specified CSV file. Each appointment is written as a line in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      appointments - the list of appointments to be saved
      filePath - the file path where appointments should be saved

    • loadAppointments

      public static ArrayList<Appointment> loadAppointments(ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      Loads appointments from a CSV file and populates the provided list. Each line in the file corresponds to an appointment with details (patient ID, doctor ID, date, time, status).
      Parameters:
      appointments - the list to store the loaded appointments
      Returns:
      the list of loaded appointments

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public static boolean updateAppointmentStatus(Appointment appointment)
      Updates the status of a specific appointment in the appointment list. Searches for the appointment by patient ID and doctor ID, then updates its status.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment whose status needs to be updated
      Returns:
      true if the status was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getTimeIndex

      public static int getTimeIndex(String time)
      Converts a time string (e.g., "EIGHT", "NINE") into its corresponding index for a time slot. The time slots range from "EIGHT" to "FIVE", each with a corresponding index.
      Parameters:
      time - the time string to convert (e.g., "EIGHT", "NINE")
      Returns:
      the index of the time slot, or -1 if the time is invalid

    • getTime

      public static String getTime(String time)
      Converts a time string (e.g., "EIGHT") to its corresponding 24-hour format string (e.g., "0800").
      Parameters:
      time - the time string to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding 24-hour format string, or null if the time is invalid

    • getTimeAlpha

      public static String getTimeAlpha(String time)
      Converts a 24-hour format string (e.g., "0800") back to its corresponding time string (e.g., "EIGHT").
      Parameters:
      time - the 24-hour format string to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding time string, or null if the time is invalid

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(Appointment appointment, ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      Adds a new appointment to the appointments list and updates the doctor's availability. The appointment details are saved to the CSV file and the doctor's schedule is updated to reflect the appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to add
      appointments - the list of current appointments

    • changeAppointment

      public static void changeAppointment(Appointment chosenAppointment, ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      Changes the details of an existing appointment, including updating the date and time. Ensures that the target date and time are available before updating the appointment.
      Parameters:
      chosenAppointment - the appointment to change
      appointments - the list of current appointments

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(String pID, Appointment selectedAppointment, ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      Deletes an existing appointment from the appointments list and updates the doctor's availability. The appointment is removed from the CSV file, and the doctor's schedule is updated to reflect the availability.
      Parameters:
      pID - the patient ID associated with the appointment to delete
      selectedAppointment - the appointment to delete
      appointments - the list of current appointments

    • printPendingConfirmedAppointments

      public static Map<Integer,Appointment> printPendingConfirmedAppointments(String patientID)
      Prints a list of pending or confirmed appointments for a specific patient. Filters appointments by the patient's ID and status (Pending or Confirmed).
      Parameters:
      patientID - the patient ID to filter appointments by
      Returns:
      a map of appointment indices and the corresponding appointments

    • createNewAppt

      public static Appointment createNewAppt(String patientID, String doctorID)
      Creates a new appointment for a patient with a specified doctor. Prompts the user to enter appointment details, such as the date and time, and returns the created appointment.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient requesting the appointment
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor for the appointment
      Returns:
      the newly created appointment

    • selectAppointment

      public static Appointment selectAppointment(String patientID)
      Allows a patient to select an appointment from a list of available appointments. The patient can choose an appointment by its index, and the selected appointment is returned.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient selecting the appointment
      Returns:
      the selected appointment

    • selectCompletedAppointmentForDoc

      public static Appointment selectCompletedAppointmentForDoc(String doctorID, ArrayList<Appointment> docAppointments)
      Allows a doctor to select a completed appointment from a list of their completed appointments. The doctor can choose an appointment by its index, and the selected appointment is returned.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor selecting the completed appointment
      docAppointments - the list of completed appointments for the doctor
      Returns:
      the selected completed appointment

    • acceptOrDeclineAppointment

      public static void acceptOrDeclineAppointment(String doctorID, ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      Allows a doctor to accept or decline pending appointments. The doctor can view a list of pending appointments, select one, and choose to accept or decline it.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor managing appointments
      appointments - the list of all appointments

    • viewUpcomingAppointments

      public static void viewUpcomingAppointments(ArrayList<Appointment> appointments, String doctorID)
      Views the upcoming appointments for a specific doctor. Displays the appointments scheduled for the doctor, including the details such as date, time, and patient ID.
      Parameters:
      appointments - the list of all appointments
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor whose upcoming appointments are to be viewed
